abstract.para: The topic covers the steps to take to deploy the selfinstall image.

topic.para: The following procedure describes how to deploy &productnameshort; using the selfinstall ISO image:

step.para: Boot your machine with the selfinstall ISO attached.
Select Install SL Micro to start the installation process.
Select the disk where &productnameshort; will be installed and confirm that you want to delete data on the disk. A &productnameshort; image is then copied to the disk.
Using &kexec;, your system reboots and is then prepared for the configuration process.

Start the configuration process by selecting SL Micro. If the configuration device is provided, &productnameshort; is configured according to the instructions provided on the configuration device. Otherwise &jeosfirstboot; is triggered as described in .
After the configuration process is complete, you can log in to your system.
Perform post-deployment steps as described in .
